item.title: Android + IOIO + Breathalyzer
item.description: Proof of concept breathalyzer powered by Android and IOIO. This article will demonstrate a basic alcohol gas detection device for Android over USB (or bluetooth). For additional background information on interfacing Android with IOIO, check out my other introductoryÂ tutorials: Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Output Android + IOIO + Simple Digital Input Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Output Android + IOIO + Simple Analog Input
